Kmerize provides convenience tools for creating and analyzing k-mers.

## Installation

You can install the released version of kmerize from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("c5sire/kmerize")
```

## Example

See the basic [tutorial](https://c5sire.github.io/kmerize/articles/Basic.html).
